domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

text:
@atrupar 🦊

How any of these snipers can take pot shots at ANY governors who reacted to Covid-19 virus on or about 16MAR2020 to keep their constituent's safe and out of harm's way, 

is heinous and disgusting.

Move it.  We'll continue to stay safe in spite of your recklessness.
